title: Episode 96: Ft. Fat Boy
itunes:title: Episode 96: Ft. Fat Boy
description:
Angela Yee, Stephanie Santiago and guest co-host Aviane "Perfection" Vargas sit down with comedian Fat Boy to have some funny sex talk while his girlfriend sits in and listens. They touch on hedonism, which is better; going on vacation with your significant other or friends, being on social media while in a relationships and masturbation. Fat Boy admits to the ladies that he loves getting his nipples licked, how he can't go too long without sex, explains why he thinks his girlfriend is too demanding and tal
